mapper.insert: insert into shopping_cart (shopping_id, computer_id, computer_count, shopping_cart_state, user_id) values (#{shoppingId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{computerId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{computerCount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{shoppingCartState,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER})
mapper.select: select shopping_id, computer_id, computer_count, shopping_cart_state, user_id from shopping_cart
